# BMParts Endpoints
# Generated by Copilot
# Updated: 2025-12-26

## Memory MCP (VS Code Copilot)
- Base: `http://gpt-api.sparestoafrica.co.za/mcp`
- JSON-RPC: `/mcp`
- Tools: `/mcp/tools`
- Health: `/mcp/health`

## Webhooks (temporary / migration pending)
- Base (ngrok): `https://beneficent-unconceitedly-jesse.ngrok-free.dev`
- `GET /webhook/inventory`
- `POST /webhook/best-sellers`
- `POST /webhook/update-item`
- `GET /health`

> **Note:** ngrok unreliable for some clients; prefer Cloudflare/Railway/Render.

## Local Services
| Service | Port | Purpose |
|---------|------|---------|
| gpt-memory | 8000 | Vector memory server |
| zoho-mcp | 9091 | Zoho integration |
| gpt-app | 9000 | Business GPT |
| gpt-realtime | 9002 | Voice/Realtime proxy |
| Qdrant | 6333 | Vector DB |
